node.description: Sera Alba, one of the VTubers from Sony Music Entertainment Japan‚Äôs VERSE‚Åø lineup, has launched her first-ever original extended playlist (EP) titled ‚ÄòEgo‚Äô. As part of the EP release, a lyric video for ‚ÄòLiar‚Äô was released on August 10 at 8PM (JST).
